title: The Sticky Note Confession
setting: Birchwood Legal Associates, partner offices, Friday 8 AM
premise: A sticky note reading 'I know what you did with the Henderson file' appeared on Senior Partner Wallace's desk overnight. Wallace is convinced someone is blackmailing him.

suspects.name: Diane Okafor
suspects.motive: Was reassigned off the Henderson case without explanation
suspects.alibi: I left the office at 6 PM Thursday and went to my evening law class downtown. Class ran from 7 to 9 PM. I took the bus home after.

suspects.name: Marcus Webb
suspects.motive: Overheard Wallace discussing shredding Henderson documents
suspects.alibi: I worked late until 10 PM Thursday in the associate bullpen on the second floor. I ordered takeout delivery at 8 PM and ate at my desk. Then I went home.

suspects.name: Patricia Lynne
suspects.motive: Wallace denied her request for a raise last month
suspects.alibi: I left at 5 PM on the dot Thursday. I had my book club meeting at the library from 6 to 8 PM. Several members can confirm I was there.

suspects.name: Hugo Strand
suspects.motive: Found suspicious file deletions on the server while doing routine maintenance
suspects.alibi: I was doing remote server maintenance from home Thursday evening. My VPN session ran from 8 PM to midnight. I never came into the office.

clues.title: Sticky Note Analysis
clues.content: The sticky note was written in blue ballpoint pen. Wallace's office only stocks black pens. The blue pen brand matches the ones supplied to the second-floor associate bullpen.

clues.title: Cleaning Crew Timeline
clues.content: The cleaning crew vacuumed Wallace's office at 9:15 PM Thursday and confirmed the desk was clear. The note was placed after 9:15 PM.

clues.title: Delivery App Receipt
clues.content: Marcus's takeout order was delivered at 8:04 PM to the office lobby. But the delivery driver's GPS log shows he waited in the lobby for twelve minutes because no one came to collect it until 8:16 PM.

hints.text: Pay close attention to the timeline each suspect gives for Thursday evening.
If someone ordered takeout delivery, were they actually at their desk when it arrived?
